An exact abridgement of the general history of the world from the creation to the year 1685 / by the accurate pen of a learned historian. Ferrar, Richard.
[6], 336 p.
Printed by James Moxon, for Samuel Heyrick ..., London : 1698.
Preface signed: Richard Ferrar. Imperfect: pages faded and tightly bound with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
